players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Alice, as the detective, did you investigate anyone last night? We need to coordinate to find the mafia."
You: "I am not the detective, Bob. Why are you claiming that?"
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "I am the detective and I investigated Bob. He is mafia. Vote Bob now."
You: "I believe Charlie is the detective and his investigation is reliable. We should vote Bob out."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
